metadata.Title: CVE-2017-12110 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An exploitable integer overflow vulnerability exists in the xls_appendSST function of libxls 1.4.A specially crafted XLS file can cause memory corruption resulting in remote code execution.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2017-12110` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

r-cran-readxl - 1.0.0-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: r-cran-readxl package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0.0-2').
